Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, just another new Kerbalteer here. Sofar I've managed to get a capsule onto the Munar surface with no fuel and now I'm building a craft to bring both it and it's occupant back!

Having a blast, best "new" game for me for years, great concept!

Malloy
Hi and welcome! congrats on getting to the mun! I hope your rescue mission goes well!

Welcome aboard fellow Aussie!

Rescue missions are good fun. Good luck.

Tip: Make sure it's unmanned, or you may need to make a bigger one/land more rescue rockets to rescue the rescuer!
Yes--make sure you put a crew habitat on board, or an extra pod somewhere on the craft! Maybe a Lander can underneath the main capsule. Otherwise your poor stranded Kerbal won't have anywhere to sit!
